file.name: govway_rs-api_config.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
servers:
  - url: https://{hostname}/govway/{soggetto}/api-config/v1
    description: l'accesso all'API è protetta dai controlli di accesso configurati su GovWay 
    variables:
      hostname:
        default: localhost
      soggetto:
        description: soggetto con cui è stato dispiegato il software GovWay
        default: EnteGenerico
info:
  x-api-id: https://govway.org/apiConfig
  title: GovWay Config API
  x-summary: Servizi per la configurazione di GovWay
  description: Servizi per la configurazione di GovWay
  termsOfService: https://govway.org/documentazione/api/index.html
  version: "3.3.6.p1"
  contact:
    email: info@link.it
  license:
    name: GPL v3.0
    url: 'https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt'
    
tags:
  - name: api
    description: Interfacce API che definiscono servizi REST e SOAP
  - name: erogazioni
    description: API erogate da applicativi interni al dominio di gestione
  - name: erogazioni-gruppi
    description: Classificazione in gruppi delle azioni/risorse di una API erogata
  - name: erogazioni-configurazione
    description: Configurazione dell'erogazione (Controllo Accessi, Rate Limiting, Validazione, ...)
  - name: fruizioni
    description: Fruizioni di API da parte di applicativi interni al dominio di gestione 
  - name: fruizioni-gruppi
    description: Classificazione in gruppi delle azioni/risorse di una API fruita
  - name: fruizioni-configurazione
    description: Configurazione della fruizione (Controllo Accessi, Rate Limiting, Validazione, ...)
  - name: soggetti
    description: soggetti esterni o interni al dominio di gestione
  - name: applicativi
    description: applicativi client che fruiscono di API
  - name: applicativi-server
    description: applicativi server che erogano una API
  - name: ruoli
    description: ruoli associabili agli applicativi ed ai soggetti
  - name: scope
    description: scope
  - name: Status
    description: >-
      Ritorna lo stato dell'applicazione
          
paths:
  
   # ** API **
   
  /api:
    parameters:
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/profilo"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/soggetto"
    get:
      tags:
        - api
      parameters:
        - $ref: "teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/parameters/q"
        - $ref: "teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/parameters/limit"
        - $ref: "teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/parameters/offset"
        - $ref: "govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/parameters/tipo_api"
        - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/tag"
        - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/parameters/profilo_qualsiasi'
      summary: Ricerca api
      operationId: findAllApi
      description: Elenca le API registrate
      responses: 
        "200":
          description: Ricerca eseguita correttamente
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ListaApi"
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
    post:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Creazione di un'API
      operationId: createApi
      description: Questa operazione consente di creare una API
      requestBody:
        description: Dati dell'api che si vuole creare
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Api'
      responses:
        "201":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/201Created'
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        '409':
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/409Conflict'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
  /api/{nome}/{versione}:
    parameters:
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/profilo"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/soggetto"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_ncname"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_versione"
    get:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Restituisce i dettagli di una API
      operationId: getApi
      description: Questa operazione consente di ottenere i dettagli di una API identificata dal nome e dalla versione
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Dettagli di una API restituiti con successo
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ApiViewItem"
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
    delete:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Elimina un'api 
      operationId: deleteApi
      description: Questa operazione consente di eliminare un API identificata dal nome e dalla versione
      responses: 
        "204":
          description: API eliminata con successo
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
  /api/{nome}/{versione}/informazioni:
    parameters:
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/profilo"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/soggetto"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_ncname"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_versione"   
    get:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Restituisce le informazioni generali di una API
      operationId: getApiInformazioniGenerali
      description: Questa operazione consente di ottenere le informazioni generali di una API identificata dal nome e dalla versione
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Informazioni generali restituite con successo
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ApiInformazioniGeneraliView"
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
    put:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Consente di modificare le informazioni generali di una API
      operationId: updateApiInformazioniGenerali
      description: Questa operazione consente di aggiornare le informazioni generali di una API identificata dal nome e dalla versione
      requestBody:
        description: Dati da aggiornare
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiInformazioniGenerali'
      responses: 
        "204":
          description: API aggiornata correttamente
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
  /api/{nome}/{versione}/referente:
    parameters:
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/profilo"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/soggetto"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_ncname"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_versione"   
    get:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Restituisce il nome del soggetto referente dell'api
      operationId: getApiReferente
      description: Questa operazione consente di ottenere il nome del soggetto referente dell'API identificata dal nome e dalla versione
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Nome del soggetto referente restituito con successo
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ApiReferenteView"
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'          
  /api/{nome}/{versione}/interfaccia:
    parameters:
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/profilo"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/soggetto"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_ncname"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_versione"   
    get:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Restituisce i dettagli dell'interfaccia di una API
      operationId: getApiInterfaccia
      description: Questa operazione consente di ottenere i dettagli dell'interfaccia di una API identificata dal nome e dalla versione
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Interfaccia dell'API restituita con successo
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ApiInterfacciaView"
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
    put:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Consente di modificare l'interfaccia di una API
      operationId: updateApiInterfaccia
      description: Questa operazione consente di aggiornare l'interfaccia di una API identificata dal nome e dalla versione
      requestBody:
        description: Dati da aggiornare
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiInterfaccia'
      responses: 
        "204":
          description: L'interfaccia è stata aggiornata correttamente
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
  /api/{nome}/{versione}/interfaccia/download:
    parameters:
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/profilo"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/soggetto"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_ncname"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_versione"   
    get:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Restituisce l'interfaccia di una API
      operationId: downloadApiInterfaccia
      description: Questa operazione consente di ottenere l'interfaccia di una API identificata dal nome e dalla versione
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Interfaccia dell'API restituita con successo
          content:
            application/*:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
            text/*:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
  /api/{nome}/{versione}/descrizione:
    parameters:
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/profilo"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/soggetto"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_ncname"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_versione"   
    get:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Restituisce la descrizione di una API
      operationId: getApiDescrizione
      description: Questa operazione consente di ottenere la descrizione di una API identificata dal nome e dalla versione
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Dati della descrizione restituiti con successo
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ApiDescrizione"
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
    put:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Consente di modificare la descrizione di una API
      operationId: updateApiDescrizione
      description: Questa operazione consente di aggiornare la descrizione di una API identificata dal nome e dalla versione
      requestBody:
        description: Dati da aggiornare
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiDescrizione'
      responses: 
        "204":
          description: La descrizione è stato aggiornata correttamente
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
          
  /api/{nome}/{versione}/tags:
    parameters:
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/profilo"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/soggetto"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_ncname"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_versione"   
    get:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Restituisce i tags associati all'API
      operationId: getApiTags
      description: Questa operazione consente di ottenere i tags associati all'API identificata dal nome e dalla versione
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Tags restituiti con successo
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ApiTags"
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
    put:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Consente di modificare i tags associati all'API
      operationId: updateApiTags
      description: Questa operazione consente di aggiornare i tags associati all'API identificata dal nome e dalla versione
      requestBody:
        description: Dati da aggiornare
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiTags'
      responses: 
        "204":
          description: I tags sono stati aggiornati correttamente
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
          
  /api/{nome}/{versione}/canale:
    parameters:
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/profilo"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/soggetto"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_ncname"
      - $ref: "govway_core.yaml#/components/parameters/id_versione"   
    get:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Restituisce il canale associato all'API
      operationId: getApiCanale
      description: Questa operazione consente di ottenere il canale associato all'API identificata dal nome e dalla versione
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Canale restituito con successo
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiCanale"
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
    put:
      tags:
        - api
      summary: Consente di modificare il canale associato all'API
      operationId: updateApiCanale
      description: Questa operazione consente di aggiornare il canale associato all'API identificata dal nome e dalla versione
      requestBody:
        description: Dati da aggiornare
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConfigurazioneApiCanale'
      responses: 
        "204":
          description: Il canale è stato aggiornato correttamente
        "400":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        "401":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        "403":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        "404":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/404NotFound'
        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'

        "429":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/429TooManyRequests'
        "503":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/503ServiceUnavailable'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default' 

  /status:
    get:
      tags:
        - Status
      summary: Ritorna lo stato dell'applicazione
      operationId: getStatus
      description: >-
        Ritorna lo stato dell'applicazione in formato problem+json
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/200Status'
        default:
          $ref: 'teamdigitale-openapi_definitions.yaml#/components/responses/default'
   
components:

  schemas:

    # API
    Api:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiBase'   
        - type: object
          properties:
            interfaccia:
              type: string
              format: byte
            canale:
              $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/IdCanale'
            modi:
              $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiModI'

    ApiItem:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiBaseConSoggetto'
        - type: object       
          required:
           - stato
           - stato_descrizione
          properties:
            stato:
              $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/StatoApiEnum'
            stato_descrizione:
              $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/StatoApiDescrizione'
            canale:
              $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiCanale'
        
    ListaApi:
       type: object
       allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/Lista'
          - type: object
            required:
              - items
            properties:
              items:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiItem'
    ApiViewItem:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiItem'
    ApiInformazioniGenerali:
      type: object
      required:
        - nome
        - versione
      properties:
        nome:
          $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
        versione:
          type: integer
          format: int32
          minimum: 1
          example: 1
    ApiInformazioniGeneraliView:
      type: object
      allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/BaseItem'
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiInformazioniGenerali'
    ApiReferente:
      type: object
      required:
        - referente
      properties:
        referente:
          $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/SimpleName'
    ApiReferenteView:
      type: object
      allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/BaseItem'
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiReferente'
    ApiInterfaccia:
      type: object
      required:
        - interfaccia
      properties:
        interfaccia:
          type: string
          format: byte
    ApiInterfacciaView:
      type: object
      allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/BaseItem'
          - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiInterfaccia'
          - type: object
            required:
              - tipo_interfaccia
            properties:
              tipo_interfaccia:
                type: object
                oneOf:
                  - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiInterfacciaRest'
                  - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiInterfacciaSoap'
                discriminator:
                  propertyName: protocollo
                  mapping:
                    'rest': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiInterfacciaRest'
                    'soap': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiInterfacciaSoap'
    ApiDescrizione:
      type: object
      required:
        - descrizione
      properties:
        descrizione:
          type: string
          maxLength: 255
          example: 'descrizione API'
          
    ApiTags:
      type: object
      required:
        - tags
      properties:
        tags:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
          example: [PagamentiTelematici, Anagrafica] 
          
    ApiAllegato:
      type: object
      required:
        - allegato
      properties:
        allegato:
          type: object
          oneOf:
            - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiAllegatoGenerico'
            - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiAllegatoSpecificaSemiformale'
          discriminator:
            propertyName: ruolo
            mapping:
              'allegato': '#/components/schemas/ApiAllegatoGenerico'
              'specificaSemiFormale': '#/components/schemas/ApiAllegatoSpecificaSemiformale'
    ApiAllegatoGenerico:
      type: object
      required:
        - nome
        - documento
        - ruolo
      properties:
        nome:
          type: string
          # rilassato vincolo, un allegato puo' avere qualsiasi $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
        documento:
          type: string
          format: byte
        ruolo:
          $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/RuoloAllegatoAPI' 
    ApiAllegatoSpecificaSemiformale:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiAllegatoGenerico'
        - type: object
          required:
            - tipo_specifica
          properties:
           tipo_specifica:
             $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/TipoSpecificaSemiformaleEnum' 

    ApiAllegatoItem:
      type: object
      required:
        - allegato
      properties:
        allegato:
          type: object
          oneOf:
            - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiAllegatoItemGenerico'
            - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiAllegatoItemSpecificaSemiformale'
          discriminator:
            propertyName: ruolo
            mapping:
              'allegato': '#/components/schemas/ApiAllegatoItemGenerico'
              'specificaSemiFormale': '#/components/schemas/ApiAllegatoItemSpecificaSemiformale'
    ApiAllegatoItemGenerico:
      type: object
      required:
        - nome
        - ruolo
      properties:
        nome:
          type: string
          # rilassato vincolo, un allegato puo' avere qualsiasi $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'           
        ruolo:
          $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/RuoloAllegatoAPI'
    ApiAllegatoItemSpecificaSemiformale:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiAllegatoItemGenerico'
        - type: object
          required:
            - tipo_specifica
          properties:
           tipo_specifica:
             $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/TipoSpecificaSemiformaleEnum' 
    ListaApiAllegati:
       type: object
       allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/Lista'
          - type: object
            required:
              - items
            properties:
              items:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiAllegatoItem'

    ApiRisorsa:
      type: object
      required:
        - http_method
        - path
      properties:
       http_method:
          $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/HttpMethodEnum'
       path:
         type: string
         maxLength: 255
         example: '/libri'
       nome:
         $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
       descrizione:
         type: string
         maxLength: 255
       id_collaborazione:
         type: boolean
         default: false
         example: false
       riferimento_id_richiesta:
         type: boolean
         example: false
       modi:
         $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiModIRisorsaRest'
    ListaApiRisorse:
       type: object
       allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/Lista'
          - type: object
            required:
              - items
            properties:
              items:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiRisorsa'

    ApiServizio:
      type: object
      required:
        - nome
        - profilo_collaborazione
      properties:
       nome:
         $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
       descrizione:
         type: string
         maxLength: 255
       profilo_collaborazione:
          $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/ProfiloCollaborazioneEnum'
       id_collaborazione:
         type: boolean
         default: false
         example: false
       riferimento_id_richiesta:
         type: boolean
         example: false
    ListaApiServizi:
       type: object
       allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/Lista'
          - type: object
            required:
              - items
            properties:
              items:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiServizio'
                  
    ApiAzione:
      type: object
      required:
        - nome
        - profilo_ridefinito
      properties:
       nome:
         $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
       profilo_ridefinito:
         type: boolean
         default: false
       profilo_collaborazione:
          $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/ProfiloCollaborazioneEnum'
       id_collaborazione:
         type: boolean
         default: false
         example: false
       riferimento_id_richiesta:
         type: boolean
         example: false
       modi:
         $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiModIAzioneSoap'
    ListaApiAzioni:
       type: object
       allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/Lista'
          - type: object
            required:
              - items
            properties:
              items:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApiAzione'

    # Erogazione 
    Erogazione:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/APIImpl'
        - type: object
          properties:
            descrizione:
                type: string
            erogazione_nome:
                $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
            erogazione_versione:
                $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/Versione'
            canale:
                $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/IdCanale'
            modi:
              oneOf:
              - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ErogazioneModISoap'
              - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ErogazioneModIRest'
              discriminator:
                propertyName: protocollo
                mapping:
                  'soap': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ErogazioneModISoap'
                  'rest': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ErogazioneModIRest' 
    ErogazioneItem:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiImplItem'
    ListaErogazioni:
      type: object
      allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/Lista'
          - type: object
            required:
              - items
            properties:
              items:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErogazioneItem'
    ErogazioneViewItem:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiImplViewItem'
     
    # Fruizione 
    Fruizione:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/APIImpl'
        - type: object
          required:
            - erogatore
          properties:
            descrizione:
                type: string
            fruizione_nome:
                $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
            fruizione_versione:
                $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/Versione'
            erogatore:
              $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/SimpleName'
            canale:
              $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/IdCanale'
            modi:
              oneOf:
              - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/FruizioneModISoap'
              - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/FruizioneModIRest'
              discriminator:
                propertyName: protocollo
                mapping:
                  'soap': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/FruizioneModISoap'
                  'rest': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/FruizioneModIRest' 
    FruizioneItem:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiImplItem'
        - type: object
          required:
            - erogatore
          properties:
            erogatore:
              $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/SimpleName'
    ListaFruizioni:
       type: object
       allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/Lista'
          - type: object
            required:
              - items
            properties:
              items:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/FruizioneItem'
    FruizioneViewItem:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ApiImplViewItem'
        - type: object
          required:
            - erogatore
          properties:
            erogatore:
              $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/SimpleName'
              
    # Soggetti
    Soggetto:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/BaseCredenziali'
        - type: object
          required:
            - nome
          properties:
            nome:
              $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/SimpleName'
            dominio:
              $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/DominioEnum'
            descrizione:
              type: string
              maxLength: 255
              example: 'descrizione del soggetto EnteEsterno'
            ruoli:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
              example: ['ruolo1', 'ruolo2']
            proprieta:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/Proprieta4000'
    SoggettoItem:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/BaseItem'
        - type: object
          required:
            - nome
            - dominio
          properties:
            nome:
              $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/SimpleName'
            dominio:
              $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/DominioEnum'
            count_ruoli:
              type: integer
              format: int32
              minimum: 0
              example: 0
    ListaSoggetti:
      type: object
      allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/Lista'
          - type: object
            required:
              - items
            properties:
              items:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/SoggettoItem'
            
    # Applicativi
    Applicativo:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/BaseCredenziali'
        - type: object
          required:
            - nome
          properties:
            nome:
              $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'            
            ruoli:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
              example: ['ruolo1', 'ruolo2']
            proprieta:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/Proprieta4000'
            modi:
              type: object
              oneOf:
                - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ModIApplicativoInterno'
                - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ModIApplicativoEsterno'
              discriminator:
                propertyName: dominio
                mapping:
                  'interno': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ModIApplicativoInterno'
                  'esterno': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ModIApplicativoEsterno'
    ApplicativoItem:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/BaseSoggettoItem'
        - type: object
          required: 
            - nome
          properties:
            nome:
              $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
            count_ruoli:
              type: integer
              format: int32
              minimum: 0
              example: 3
    ListaApplicativi:
       type: object
       allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/Lista'
          - type: object
            required:
              - items
            properties:
              items:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApplicativoItem'

    # ApplicativiServer
    ApplicativoServer:
      type: object
      required:
        - nome
      properties:
        nome:
          $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'            
        proprieta:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/Proprieta4000'
        connettore:
           type: object
           oneOf:
             - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettoreHttp' 
             - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettoreFile'
             - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettoreJms'
             - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettoreNull'
             - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettoreEcho'
             - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettorePlugin'
             - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettoreApplicativoServer'
             - $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettoreMessageBox'
           discriminator:
             propertyName: tipo
             mapping:
               'http': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettoreHttp'
               'file': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettoreFile'
               'jms': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettoreJms'
               'null': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettoreNull'
               'echo': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettoreEcho'
               'plugin': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettorePlugin'
               'applicativo-server': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettoreApplicativoServer'
               'message-box': 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ConnettoreMessageBox' 
    ApplicativoServerItem:
      type: object
      allOf:
        - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/BaseSoggettoItem'
        - type: object
          required: 
            - nome
          properties:
            nome:
              $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
    ListaApplicativiServer:
       type: object
       allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/Lista'
          - type: object
            required:
              - items
            properties:
              items:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ApplicativoServerItem'
                 
    # Ruoli
    Ruolo:
      type: object
      required:
        - nome
      properties:
        nome:
          $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
        descrizione:
          type: string
          maxLength: 255
          example: 'descrizione del ruolo' 
        fonte:
          $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/FonteEnum'
        identificativo_esterno:
          type: string
          maxLength: 255
          example: 'urn://accesso_sola_lettura'
        contesto:
          $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ContestoEnum'
    RuoloItem:
      type: object
      required: 
        - nome
        - fonte
        - contesto
      properties:
        nome:
          $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName' 
        fonte:
          $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/FonteEnum'
        contesto:
          $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ContestoEnum'
    ListaRuoli:
       type: object
       allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/Lista'
          - type: object
            required:
              - items
            properties:
              items:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/RuoloItem'
                  
    # Scope
    Scope:
      type: object
      required:
        - nome
      properties:
        nome:
          $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
        descrizione:
          type: string
          maxLength: 255
          example: 'descrizione dello scope' 
        identificativo_esterno:
          type: string
          maxLength: 255
          example: 'urn://accesso_sola_lettura'
        contesto:
          $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ContestoEnum'
    ScopeItem:
      type: object
      required: 
        - nome
        - contesto
      properties:
        nome:
          $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/NCName'
        contesto:
          $ref: 'govway_rs-api_config-commons.yaml#/components/schemas/ContestoEnum'
    ListaScope:
       type: object
       allOf:
          - $ref: 'govway_core.yaml#/components/schemas/Lista'
          - type: object
            required:
              - items
            properties:
              items:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/ScopeItem'
